data.title: Pastis Liqueur Henri Bardouin
data.meta_description: Welcome to New York City's largest wine & spirits store online. Come see why The Wall Street Journal says Astorwines.com is one of the best websites for buying wine online. Check out our daily deals and features. View our large selection of wines, spirits, and sake. We specialize in everything from old world to new world, organic & natural wines, whiskeys & scotches and everything else.
data.text:
Here is a drink which is so famous that a song is dedicated to it. There are many versions of this song, here is one: ------- Dans la forêt d'Afrique, (In the African Forest) Un congolais chantait, (A Congolese was singing) Pastis 51, boisson alcooliséé (Pastis 51, alcoholic beverage) 51, je t'aime, (51, I love you) J'en boirai des tonneaux [et des tonneaux] (I would drink barrels of it... and barrels) A me rouler par terre, jusqu'au prochain bistrot. (Til I roll on the ground to the next bistro) Et si tu m'abandonne, (and if you leave me) Alors je m'empoisonne (then I will poison myself) Avec une bonbonne, (with a demijohn) D'un bon Ricard bien jaune (of a good yellow Ricard) -------- Cheers!

- MB
